column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////More than a year after my first review
column2: and the place is still a stunner. My go-to item. the bone-in
column3: dry-aged ribeye (medium rare) is still the best steak I can get anywhere. I absolutely love it. But I've been there twice just for the fried chicken and that is a winner
column5: let me tell you! Everything they do is awesome: the fries
column8: all the salads. I leave full and very satisfied
column9: and continually impressed with the quality of the food and the high level of service.
